lead_paragraph: WEIL--Gordon, 66, of Brooklyn, passed away suddenly on February 11, 2016. Beloved husband of Kathy Glick Weil, devoted father of Jeffrey (Rebeca Rodriguez Caro) and Aaron Weil, loving grandfather of Olivia Caro Weil, dear brother of Robert A. (Celeste) Weil and the late James A. Weil. Funeral services to be held at Gutterman's Brooklyn Chapel on Tuesday, February 16 at 12 noon. In lieu of flowers, contributions to the James Auer Weil Scholarship Fund at Tulane University, Development Office, PO Box 61075, New Orleans, LA 70161, would be appreciated. 1/3
